com.milk.objed
Class FixedFieldsEditor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.objed.BaseEditor
        |
        +--com.milk.objed.BaseFieldsEditor
              |
              +--com.milk.objed.FixedFieldsEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Editable, Editor, FieldsEditor
public class FixedFieldsEditor
extends BaseFieldsEditor

This is an implementation of FieldsEditor which keeps a fixed list of fields. It is considered immutable only if all of its fields are immutable. It also has a public method to change the description.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

Nested Class Summary
private  class FixedFieldsEditor.FieldsListener
          This class is used as a listener on all the fields, in order to adjust this (outer) object's concept of its own mutability, and in order to have it send out the right events.

update

public final void update()
Ask this editor to update its internal state. In this case, it just passes the same request to each of its fields.
